H

handleAllTextFields() - Method in class com.example.lunalunera.controller.GameController
It runs the handleTextFields() and handleCorrectAnswers() methods in all the textField array
handleCorrectAnswers(int) - Method in class com.example.lunalunera.controller.GameController
Method which add a listener to one textField of the array and see if the new letter is one of the secret word by using the isACorrectAnswer() method.
handleHelpButton() - Method in class com.example.lunalunera.controller.GameController
Method which calls the helpWithTheSecretWord() method when the helpButton is clicked and sums one to the counter of helps used If 4 helps are used, the button is disabled
handleTextFields(int) - Method in class com.example.lunalunera.controller.GameController
Method which add a listener to one textField of the array and see if the new letter in the array is a subset of the regular expression, which is, if the letter is a legal one.
helpWithTheSecretWord() - Method in class com.example.lunalunera.controller.GameController
Method which search for the first space unaswered and answered it with the correct letter
HomeController - Class in com.example.lunalunera.controller
Class representing the controller of the HomeStage class in the view
HomeController(TextField, Button, HomeStage, Label) - Constructor for class com.example.lunalunera.controller.HomeController
Class constructor which initialize variables
HomeStage - Class in com.example.lunalunera.view
Main class from the view, which extends the Stage class
HomeStage() - Constructor for class com.example.lunalunera.view.HomeStage
Constructor method which initializes variables and executes the initStage() method
